item.description:
Healing physical or emotional issues through yoga is possible and greatly enhanced through the practice of breathwork. In this four-class series, you'll learn a method of energy breathing from the Taoist tradition which brings Qi into the body and enlivens our energetic system of chakras and meridians.

You must be in good physical condition and a positive attitude is a must! Beginners are welcome!

 

Schedule

Thursday, March 14
6:30-8:00 PM Class
Activating Qi: Stretches to Open the Meridian Channels

Thursday, March 21
6:30-8:00 PM Class
Cultivating Stillness: Breathing to Quiet the Mind & Build Energy

Thursday, March 28
6:30-8:00 PM Class
Circulating Qi: Stretches to Move Energy through Blockages

Saturday, April 6
11:00 AM-1:00 PM - Two-hour Workshop
Visualizing Energy: Using the Mind to Revitalize Qi in the Chakras
(A snack break will be held during the workshop.)

 

This series is only $35 for all four sessions. You must attend the first three sessions to attend the final workshop. * Note: The workshop session will be a two-hour workshop.

 

To register, please RSVP to this meetup. I will be sending you a separate email with directions and a link to pre-registration materials.
item.name: Healing with Yoga & Breathwork
